statements: SELECT * FROM student_grades;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, student_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM student_grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM student_grades;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM student_grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(grade) > 70
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS num_students, COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) AS num_courses FROM student_grades
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade, CONCAT('Grade: ', CAST(grade AS CHAR)) AS grade_display FROM student_grades ORDER BY student_id, course_id DESC
SELECT * FROM student_grades;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_grades ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE student_id = 101 AND course_id = 201;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM student_grades WHERE course_id = 301;
SELECT student_id, course_id, date FROM attendance_records ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_grades
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM student_grades GROUP BY student_id
SELECT course_id, COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS number_of_students FROM student_grades GROUP BY course_id
SELECT student_id, course_id, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM student_grades GROUP BY student_id, course_id
SELECT student_id, course_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM student_grades GROUP BY student_id, course_id
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE student_id = 123 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE attendance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM student_grades GROUP BY course_id HAVING count > 5;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name FROM course_assignments ORDER BY assignment_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT course_id, student_id, attendance_date FROM attendance_records WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, student_id, attendance_date FROM attendance_records WHERE course_id = 3 AND attendance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_id, course_id, assignment_name FROM course_assignments WHERE assignment_id > 5 ORDER BY assignment_id ASC;

SELECT course_id, student_id, grade FROM student_grades INNER JOIN attendance_records ON student_grades.student_id = attendance_records.student_id WHERE attendance_records.attendance_date = '2022-06-15' ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade >= 90;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_grade FROM assignments WHERE assignment_grade < 60 ORDER BY assignment_grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_grade > 90 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_grade, course_id FROM assignments WHERE assignment_grade BETWEEN 80 AND 90 AND course_id = 101 ORDER BY assignment_grade DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 201 AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade < 70 OR student_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT DISTINCT course_name FROM courses WHERE start_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM student_grades;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, date, status FROM attendance_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name, date_of_birth FROM students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_id, instructor_id FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN student_grades ON students.student_id = student_grades.student_id;
